text: Mbe khuen ana nzuai, “Ŋina mbatɨk ana vhen ki.” Ana ne nzuav kha kamen mbe suaŋgi. 3.30 Zisas Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaarar ŋkasŋkan panan wo ŋaara mbui. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ma. Maaŋ muuŋgip, gumgi thari khaŋ suanga, Zisas Satan gum harigi ŋina mbatɨga ŋkasŋkan panan ŋgari. Mba khesharigi bunin Zisas ga nzuai gumgi, mbe Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaara ndim mbɨ vhuav ana nzɨɨi.
